pageContext.claim: “They haven't treated me properly. I've paid millions of taxes -- millions and millions of dollars -- in New York. And they've never treated me, you know -- since I became president, they just haven't treated, I think, the office with the kind of respect. And I don't mind paying the taxes; New York is a very expensive place to live.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump also skipped a lot of tax bills in New York, according to an investigation by the New York Times in 2018, greatly enhancing the value of his inheritance.
